programme.title: George Clarkes Amazing Spaces
programme.desc: George Clarke meets motorbike racer Ollie, whos fed up with sleeping in the back of a transit van when away at competitions and wants to transform a double decker coach into a Japanese-style pod hotel for 20 sleepers.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Penny and Russell want a holiday home near Spains seaside town of Mojácar, with a communal pool and just a short drive to the beach. Can Ben Hillman deliver their dream for £125k?

programme.title: A Place in the Sun

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: On Merseyside, the first to host is fun-loving oil and gas co-ordinator Danielle Greenwood, who has high hopes for her down-to-earth menu and her warm welcoming style of hosting.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: The action on Merseyside continues with 24-year-old pastoral care manager Steven Booth the host. Steven is a mega Tina Turner fan and each of his courses is named after her songs.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Third to host on Merseyside is glamorous PR lady Jade Chantelle, who plans a casino-themed evening and is convinced her guests will be blown away by her high class menu, lashings of champagne and a game of roulette.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Primary school teacher Anna Senior is fourth to host on Merseyside. Anna plans a fairytale-themed evening, featuring a Mad Hatters soup and a sandwich, a special pork dish cooked three ways, and baked cheesecake.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: As the week in and around Merseyside draws to a close, its the turn of 36-year-old Michael Buble impersonator Jamie Somers to host. Can Jamie and Jade put their differences from last night aside?

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: At Bechan Retreats in Powys, Karen and Bryan want to give their guests fever, cabin fever that is! Theyre proud of their luxury lodges in the Welsh hills. But a shark in the feedback gives them a cleanliness score that snaps them back to reality.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Leah Charles-King helps Jenny buy her first ever property, in San Antonio, on the Balearic island of Ibiza. Leah searches for the perfect apartment close to the beach for Jennys budget of £250k.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Industrial Age
programme.desc: Fred shifts his attention to the development of the iron and steel industries, starting with Ironbridge Gorge in Shropshire. He comes across a rolling mill which he remembers once operating in Bolton, tries his hand at chain making, and then its eyes-on-stalks time as Fred drives the biggest steam rolling mill engine he has ever seen.

programme.title: Railways: The Making of a Nation
programme.desc: The very idea of an excursion to distant places became popular from the 1840s onwards. People were taking day trips and seeing parts of the country they had never seen before. Thousands visited resorts, spa towns and the coast. A new wave of Victorian tourists spent their cash on holidays and visited hotels at stations and beyond. The ultimate experience was often to head to the hills and sample clean air, far away from industrial grime and pollution.

programme.title: Thatcher: A Very British Revolution
programme.desc: Margaret Thatchers inner circle reveals how she managed to overcome her outsider status to become a prominent political figure in Britain. After a controversial policy had the press label her the `milk-snatcher her political future was in jeopardy.

programme.title: The Jet Stream and Us
programme.desc: Documentary tracing how human understanding of the jet stream - a ribbon of fast moving air high in the atmosphere - has grown. It has been responsible for bewildering effect on bomber pilots during the Second World War.

programme.title: Bhasker Patel Remembers... Brothers in Trouble
programme.desc: Actor Bhasker Patel looks back at the 1993 BBC film Brothers in Trouble.

programme.title: Screen Two
programme.desc: Moving drama about the lives of a group of illegal Pakistani immigrants living in a boarding house in 1960s England. A skilled labourer who came to England to find better employment is relegated to shovelling sheep dung in a factory, but learns to compromise after befriending other immigrants in his boarding house. The arrival of a young white woman causes sexual and cultural tension, culminating in a bitter confrontation.

programme.title: Timeshift
programme.sub-title: Crime and Punishment: The Story of Capital Punishment
programme.desc: Timeshift digs into the archive to trace the extraordinary story of the ultimate sanction.By opting for a dispassionate history rather than staging the usual polarised debate, the programme breaks new ground with its fascinating attention to detail, such as the protocols of the public execution or the science of hanging. With contributions from both sides of the argument, it provides an essential guide to a subject that still divides us.

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Industrial Age

programme.desc: As the 20th century dawned, artists found radical new ways to depict Wales, pushing themselves to extremes and redefining what art could be.

programme.title: SAS: Catching the Criminals
programme.desc: Ex-SAS leader Billy Billingham examines the applications of military techniques in crime-fighting and offers his insights to help law enforcement agencies achieve better results.

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: Have an animal-loving couple done enough research at a plot of land in Leicestershire? Quirky properties in North Yorkshire and Norfolk also go under the hammer with intriguing results!

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Join Natasha Raskin Sharp as she visits iconic Stirling Castle, the childhood home of Mary, Queen of Scots, to see a museum about the Argyll and Sutherland Highlanders Regiment. Leading the teams, hopefully to a victory, are experts Roo Irvine and Danny Sebastian.

programme.title: BBC News at One

programme.desc: The latest national and international news, followed by weather.

programme.title: Clean It, Fix It
programme.desc: Mark Wright, Tommy Walsh and Maxine Dwyer help Mia reclaim her chaotic home and create the perfect therapy room.

programme.title: Amanda and Alans Italian Job
programme.desc: Amanda and Alan turn their attention to the great outdoors as they aim to tackle the garden. The overgrown patch of land on the side of the mountain has been untouched for more than a decade, and the pair seek help from gardening oracle Warrie Price.

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Todays Escape to the Country sees Nicki Chapman property shopping in Devon, with a pair of entrepreneurial sisters who dream of creating their very own glamping business. Keen to discover more about the holiday industry, Nicki heads to Exmoor National Park where she meets a couple whove transformed a Grade II listed manor house into a luxury bed and breakfast.

programme.title: The Travelling Auctioneers
programme.desc: Rita and Garys dad has dementia, and they must clear his house and sell his collectibles to afford care home costs. Saf rescues worn chairs, while Izzie takes charge at auction.

programme.title: The Answer Run
programme.desc: Three couples face a series of 50/50 questions which hurtle The Answer Run down towards them. Across three rounds, the couples build up their cash pots, but only one pair can face The Final Run and win the chance to take home their cash prize.

programme.title: Pointless
programme.desc: Alexander Armstrong is joined by co-host Angela Rippon for the brainy quiz where the contestants try to score as few points as possible by plumbing the depths of their general knowledge to come up with the answers no-one else could think of.

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: Theres drama ahead in Walford following an unexpected surprise, things are looking up for Harry, and Priya and Ravi face more hurdles.

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: The team restores a photo of President Kennedys children with their English nanny, a tiny drum kit clock, a melted wax statuette and a traditional Venezuelan stringed instrument.

programme.title: Panorama
programme.desc: Secret filming by Panorama reveals evidence of racism, misogyny, and officers revelling in the use of force at one of Londons busiest police stations, Charing Cross. After the murder of Sarah Everard by a serving police officer the Metropolitan Police promised change and says that since 2022 more than 1,400 officers have either been dismissed or have resigned following a clamp down on what it calls "rogue officers".

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: King George III goes from a young unpopular king to a much-loved figure some 60 years later, and we learn a bit about his court life along the way. Meanwhile, across the world we hear about some of the words we have got from India.

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: British Queen Boudica turns against her Roman masters and unleashes her wrecking ball on Colchester, St Albans and London. Meanwhile, across the world, famous emperors Caligula and Nero, dish out their own unique brand of Imperial nastiness.

programme.title: The Catch-Up
programme.desc: A round-up of the days news.

programme.title: Freddie Flintoffs Field of Dreams
programme.desc: Freddie Flintoff attempts to create a brand new cricket team from an unlikely group of teens. He is determined to prove that anyone can play competitive cricket, whatever their background.

programme.title: Stacey and Joe
programme.sub-title: This Could Go Really Well or Really Badly
programme.desc: While Stacey and her green-fingered sidekick Sam wrestle with the ever-growing vegetable patch, Joe ropes in Rex, Rose and Belle to help create the perfect Mothers Day picnic. Meanwhile, older brothers Zach and Leighton take on dinner duty.

programme.title: Waterloo Road
programme.desc: Dwayne is under pressure when Ashton exposes his deepest secrets to the entire school. Meanwhile, Nisha is conflicted when her personal and professional worlds collide.

programme.title: Waterloo Road
programme.desc: Hope and Portia go head-to-head as they battle for attention. Elsewhere, Dariuss negligence has devastating consequences, and Schuey is rocked when an unexpected visitor ruffles feathers.

programme.title: Charlie Coopers Myth Country
programme.desc: Featuring Charlie Cooper, writer and star of the BBCs `This Country, who has a fascination for the weird and wonderful world of British folklore.

programme.title: Charlie Coopers Myth Country
programme.desc: Keen to escape the trappings of a modern Christmas, Charlie wraps up warm and heads to Devon to start an investigation into alternative winters celebrations. Lots of wild winter festivals survive across the country, drawing crowds and followers on social media. Many have their origins in our ancient pagan past.

programme.title: Missing in Paradise: Searching for Sarm
programme.desc: Tir Dhondy retraces Sarms last known movements before her disappearance from a charter yacht in 2021. She hears Sarms boyfriend, Ryan Bane, give his account of what happened through his lawyer.

programme.title: Missing in Paradise: Searching for Sarm
programme.desc: Tir meets with island police and is given CCTV footage that has never been released, showing Sarms last known movements with her boyfriend, Ryan Bane.

programme.title: Missing in Paradise: Searching for Sarm
programme.desc: Tir searches for the yacht Sarm vanished from and tracks down Ryan Banes ex-wife, hearing first-hand about her experiences while married to him.

programme.title: Hidden Girls
programme.desc: A look at the hidden world of girls in gangs and the extent to which teenage girls are being criminally and sexually exploited.

programme.title: Juice
programme.desc: Guy doesnt want to see Jamma anymore, so when Jamma meets a magical stranger who offers to unburden him from his clownish ways to win Guy back, he decides to take the deal and is transformed. Guy has a photoshoot for his book cover, but he doesnt want to look boring, so Isaac offers to style him in exchange for free therapy.

programme.title: Juice
programme.desc: The new Jamma is reliable and consistent - he wants to respect Guys boundaries, but he also needs Saifs address from Guy so that he can try and reconnect with his dad. Guy is pleasantly surprised by the new and improved Jamma. Winnies dad is visiting for some quality father-daughter bonding, but shes not yet come out as straight to him and asks Isaac to play along.

programme.desc: Gaming programme presented by Steffan Powell.

programme.title: Alan Carrs Picture Slam
programme.desc: Playing this time are friends Lou and Jude from Grimsby, cousins Sibtain and Umar from London and Nottingham, and friends Steph and Jo from Barry. They are facing off across three rounds against the clock to make it to the final Super Slam and a chance to win £10,000. Do they know their cheddar cheese from their Cheddar Gorge? Find out in this hugely addictive show that will have the whole family shouting their answers at the telly.

programme.title: Juice
programme.desc: Guy and Jamma visit Guys family home to pick up his childhood diary for writing inspiration. When Jamma meets Guys mother and brother, he makes a perfect first impression, much to Guys despair. But all hell breaks loose when an unwelcome guest makes a frightening and confronting appearance.

programme.title: Juice
programme.desc: Its Guys book launch, but the venue has been double-booked with a wedding. When the bride goes missing, its Jammas time to shine - he goes to look for her to save both the launch and the wedding. Meanwhile, its still awkward between Winnie and Isaac after their near kiss. And Farida uses the launch as her chance to get Saif to sign the divorce papers.

programme.desc: A look at the hidden world of girls in gangs and the extent to which teenage girls are being criminally and sexually exploited.

programme.title: Charlie Coopers Myth Country
programme.desc: Featuring Charlie Cooper, writer and star of the BBCs `This Country, who has a fascination for the weird and wonderful world of British folklore.

programme.title: Juice
programme.desc: Guy and Jamma visit Guys family home to pick up his childhood diary for writing inspiration. When Jamma meets Guys mother and brother, he makes a perfect first impression, much to Guys despair. But all hell breaks loose when an unwelcome guest makes a frightening and confronting appearance.

programme.title: Juice
programme.desc: Its Guys book launch, but the venue has been double-booked with a wedding. When the bride goes missing, its Jammas time to shine - he goes to look for her to save both the launch and the wedding. Meanwhile, its still awkward between Winnie and Isaac after their near kiss. And Farida uses the launch as her chance to get Saif to sign the divorce papers.

programme.title: BBC Comedy Short Films
programme.desc: Comedy short films from new and established talent. Showcasing original, weird and very funny films.

programme.title: RuPauls Drag Race UK
programme.desc: RuPauls search for the UKs Next Drag Race Superstar continues in epic style. For their first challenge, the queens channel the spirit of Claudia Winkleman as they play their very own version of The Traitors.

programme.title: Global Eye
programme.desc: Bringing forensic journalism from all corners of the world by BBC Eye, the World Services critically acclaimed investigative unit, and featuring expert global correspondents getting to the heart of the biggest international stories.

programme.title: This Is BBC TWO
programme.desc: Preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Two young brothers introduce us to bocking and two ladies share their passions for high-speed motorcycling, frog breeding and knitted vegetables. Joining in the fun and games are antiques experts Kate Bliss and Christina Trevanion.

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.sub-title: Well Worth the Wait in Cornwall
programme.desc: An old Sunday School in Cornwall undergoes a heavenly transformation. Two other unique properties in Hampshire and Lancashire are up for auction with interesting plans afoot.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Experts Margie Cooper and Ishy Khan are joined by 90s Gladiators Diane Jet Youdale and James Hunter Crossley. Squeezed into a classic Fiat 500, they shop around Lancashire.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: Twenty-four hours a day, the latest national and international stories as they break.

programme.title: Politics Live
programme.desc: Jo Coburn invites a panel of guests to share their opinions on the newsmaking stories of the day.

programme.title: Impossible
programme.desc: Thirty players compete across the series, scoring points by answering questions correctly. However, they must avoid the impossible answers, otherwise they will be eliminated from the show until the next day.

programme.title: Bridge of Lies
programme.desc: Ross Kemp presents as a team of four family members, Lisa, Claire, Mark and Jack, take on the Bridge of Lies. One by one they all face the bridge, choosing who faces each crossing depending on the question category.

programme.title: Unbeatable
programme.desc: Today, Hannah, John, Helen and Vince battle it out to see which one of them is unbeatable.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Four chefs compete for Northern Ireland with canapes, starters and fish dishes inspired by the Olympics and Paralympics, all hoping to cook at a banquet to wish Team GB athletes luck as they head for Paris 2024.

programme.title: Wild West: Americas Great Frontier
programme.desc: From the mysterious Sea of Cortez to the wild and elemental Pacific Ocean, powerful earth forces shape the coastline of the Wild West. These restless shores are a magnet for life; visited by the greatest of all animals, the blue whale, and by strange fish that come ashore on the full moon to spawn in their thousands.

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: The team are in Huddersfield in West Yorkshire, and experts Mark Stacey and Christina Trevanion are on hand to find a selection of objects to take to auction. A beautifully crafted clock catches Christinas eye, while Mark is drawn to an unusual piece of Lalique glass. Meanwhile, Paul Martin pays a visit to Nostell Priory, a grand house that reveals a perfect marriage between Georgian architecture and craftsmanship.

programme.title: Richard Osmans House of Games
programme.desc: Melanie Bracewell, Ruth Madeley, Jenny Powell and Mark Steel test their general knowledge skills on this weeks House of Games.

programme.title: Strictly Come Dancing: It Takes Two
programme.desc: Janette Manrara has an exciting guide through all the backstage ballroom action, with more couples stopping by for a chat. And dont miss an exclusive first look at how some of the celebrities are handling their new dances.

programme.title: SOS: Extreme Rescues
programme.desc: New recruits are put to the test rescuing an injured climber, search dog Barneys on the hunt for a missing person, and a 13-year-old schoolgirl dislocates her knee in a gorge.

programme.title: Grand Tours of Scotlands Rivers
programme.desc: Paul explores the River Oykel in Sutherland from its source in Assynt to the Dornoch Firth and the sea. He learns about the loneliest and highest war grave in Scotland, tries for trout in a lochan, and then hears about the Year of the Sheep.

programme.title: Disclosure
programme.desc: Examining the issues affecting the lives of people around Scotland.

programme.title: Wilderness with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: Simon Reeve travels across the Kalahari in Southern Africa. Along the way, Simon tracks wildebeest with a group of one of the regions indigenous inhabitants, the San, who are renowned for their hunting and tracking techniques.

programme.title: Inside No. 9
programme.desc: Beattie and Sam are a young couple finally on the property ladder, but the only flat they can afford has a dark and sinister past, a past that demands to be heard.

programme.title: Newsnight
programme.desc: Featuring extensive coverage of the days top national and international news stories, along with explanations about the context and potential aftereffects.

programme.title: BBC Weather
programme.desc: The latest weather forecast.

programme.title: Unspun World with John Simpson
programme.desc: John Simpson brings his expertise to bear on the most important stories. In discussion with the BBCs range of experts across the world, he uses their unique local knowledge to go beyond the headlines to get to the unspun truth about the world.

programme.title: Eva Longoria: Searching for Spain
programme.desc: Eva Longoria explores Barcelona and the Catalonia region, a Mediterranean hub of creativity and cuisine, where world-class chefs push the boundaries of Spanish food.

programme.title: Secrets of the Brain
programme.desc: Professor Jim Al-Khalili unravels the mystery of how the most complex structure known of in the universe - the human brain - came to exist.

programme.title: Stranded on Honeymoon Island
programme.desc: A full moon party is thrown at the final Couples Cove. But when events take a surprising turn, one pair is left questioning their future, before the honeymooners leave their beaches to spend time apart contemplating their relationships.

programme.title: The Newsreader
programme.desc: In 1986, the cutthroat world of commercial television news throws ambitious reporter Dale and newsreader Helen together.

programme.title: MasterChef
programme.desc: This is the big one. The 21st MasterChef grand final. Weeks of hard graft have led to this moment when one of the three finalists will come out on top.

programme.title: This is CBBC!
programme.desc: Join the CBBC crew for all your favourite programmes. Tune into CBBC every day from 7.00am.

programme.title: Shaun the Sheep
programme.desc: The sheep discover a mysterious buzzing object in their field. Shaun investigates and finds its full of bees, who make the flocks life a misery.

programme.title: Danger Mouse
programme.desc: The greatest secret agent and his clumsy sidekick continue their fight against Baron Greenback.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher Unleashed!
programme.desc: JJs so keen to get Dennis the new bike she thinks hes desperate to have, that she agrees to make a deal with Walter, and without realising it, passes on information that could lead to a jelly-blasting rampage.

programme.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
programme.desc: Sensai comes over for a visit and Dog tries giving him a retirement gift.

programme.title: Newsround
programme.desc: News magazine keeping young viewers up to date with the latest stories and events happening at home and abroad.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: A meteorite falls not far from the cabin. While the Lemmings are sledding outside on a metal pot lid, their sled is abruptly drawn to the extraterrestrial boulder.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have set up a long line of dominos in the cabin that ends with several giant ice blocks and a rocket outside. Weary of not finding the peace and calm he loves so dearly, Grizzy sabotages the game. The rocket hits an ice block and blows up the cabin. Grizzy gets his hands on a machine that can sculpt ice. The bear dreams of an igloo, but the Lemmings have other projects.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Squidward let Plankton steal a secret formula, and they have to steal it back.

programme.title: Odd Squad
programme.sub-title: Why Did the Chicken Cross the Dimension?
programme.desc: The Mobile Unit is called upon when a lost Baby Laser Chicken is found in the Austrian countryside.

programme.title: Deadly 60
programme.desc: Steve Backshall searches for meerkats, aardwolves and aardvarks.

programme.title: Bitesize: 9-11 Year Olds
programme.desc: Learn about decimals, simplifying tenths and hundredths, equivalent fractions, decimals and percentages.

programme.title: Wow Thats Amazing
programme.desc: Owain and Tilly find out that it is possible to bring a rainbow indoors, discover a way to feel as well as hear sound, and learn how to freak people out with some photographic foolery.

programme.title: Our School
programme.desc: Year 8 get their hands dirty in the school allotment, while Year 7s green team focus on recycling.

programme.title: Ricky Wilsons Art Jam
programme.desc: Online sensation and Olympic medal winner Nile Wilson visits the Art Jam studio to show Ricky three items that mean the world to him, a black and white painting of Nile in action, a Commonwealth Games gold medal and some precious fan art.

programme.title: One Zoo Three
programme.desc: The brothers celebrate Mothers Day. Its a big step for snow leopard cub Shen, jaguar Kiera has a break from daughter Inka, and Tilly the red panda could be having a baby.

programme.title: The Dengineers
programme.desc: Nine-year-old Nya shares a room with her two-year-old brother who often wakes her at night and keeps her up to play with him. She really needs her own space to indulge her love of martial arts. She wants it to be a dojo on the inside so she can practice and not worry about her brother getting in the way.

programme.title: Absolute Genius With Dick and Dom
programme.desc: Dick and Dom reveal the genius of Marie Curie, one of the most famous female scientists of all time. Inspired by Curies genius ideas, they come up with their own genius idea involving an exploding shed!

programme.title: Operation Ouch!
programme.desc: The doctors reveal how much power there is in your farts. Also, Dr Chris trains as a nurse on a ward full of robotic patients, and Dr Xand opens up the brand new Ouch-Mobile - a drop-in clinic for all medical mysteries. Meanwhile, over in Accident and Emergency, one patient has cut her nose and another has burnt his hand.

programme.title: Shark Bites
programme.desc: Steve Backshall looks at the most graceful fish of the seas. Manta rays may not look like sharks, but they are part of the same family. Steve swims with them off the coast of Hawaii, observing their wide cartilage skeleton.

programme.title: Danny and Mick
programme.desc: Lady Fortesque has lost her diamond ring and Joy is in a panic. She tasks Danny and Mick with searching the leisure centre. Luckily Mick is head of security and he stumbles across the ring in the cafe. Problem solved, Joy heads off to call Lady Fortesque who comes to collect her ring with a reporter from the newspaper. Unfortunately Mick has lost the ring again. Can Danny make his way through the soft play to get the ring back?

programme.title: Andy And The Band
programme.desc: Odd Sock Alana needs help with her disobedient French poodle, Monty. Andy and the Band try to train the pesky pup, but their canine class is decidedly dog-eared.

programme.title: Bros in Control
programme.desc: Adam and Joe become busy bees for a gunge-fuelled challenge - who will collect the most nectar and win Callums ultimate respect?

programme.title: Octonauts
programme.desc: The Octonauts must stop a huge herd of sea pigs before they march blindly into the Mariana Trench - the deepest point on earth!

programme.title: Big Lizard
programme.desc: When Dad runs out of marmalade Big Lizard shows Cosima a plant growing Proximan oranges. Its leaves turn out to be giant bugs, who arent happy about sharing their fruit!

programme.desc: The greatest secret agent and his clumsy sidekick continue their fight against Baron Greenback.

programme.desc: Dennis dresses Gnasher up as a rare breed of animal which he says is nesting in Bash Street School, hoping to get the school shut down on the day of a daunting and difficult test.

programme.desc: Grizzy is about to start eating the last remaining food in the cabin: cocktail snacks. But the sly Lemmings get there first.

programme.desc: In order to win a trophy filled with Yummy candies, Grizzy and the Lemmings take part in a safari photo competition on an animal reserve.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Patrick exchange tiny living versions of themselves.

programme.title: Little Lunch
programme.desc: The children wage an environmental battle over the old climbing tree in the school playground and whether its safe or should be removed.

programme.title: Odd Squad
programme.desc: The Odd Squad Mail Department is overrun with Pentagurps, so the Mobile Unit comes in to help before it is shut down.

programme.title: Pokemon Horizons: The Series
programme.sub-title: Liko v Rika! Toward the Battles End
programme.desc: It is time for the final exhibition match for the Terastallization Assessment. This match has Liko teaming up with Katy to go against the Elite Four member Rika. Liko wonders how she and Floragato can face off against such a powerful opponent.

programme.title: Winx Club: The Magic Is Back
programme.desc: When Stellas ring mysteriously disappears, the Winx embark on a risky mission to retrieve it from Cloud Tower. As they explore the schools eerie tunnels, Bloom faces a powerful awakening.

programme.title: The Football Academy
programme.desc: Eloise and Holly try to prove they should stay at the Football Academy, while Harry, Julian and Ace go all-out in Italy. Michael Dawson takes on Folo in Skill Showdown.

programme.title: Gladiators: Epic Pranks
programme.desc: Giant is pranked by Nitro when he appears as a guest of honour at a fake school award ceremony! The other Gladiators have sneaky fun backstage at Sheffield Arena.

programme.title: Andy and the Band
programme.sub-title: Rock Star School: Rios Rockin School Trip
programme.desc: Rio leads his class out on a field trip, with surprising results.

programme.title: The Next Step
programme.desc: Eldon tries to move on when Michelle rejects him.

programme.title: This Is CBeebies
programme.desc: Welcome to the CBeebies channel. Programmes start at 6.00am.

programme.title: Vegesaurs
programme.desc: Ginger narrowly escapes becoming lunch for a swarm of hungry Pea-Rex, but ends up with a P-Rex pod stuck on her tail. The pod soon hatches to reveal three baby Pea-Rex.

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Bing and Flop are building a sandcastle when Pando joins them in the sandpit with his wind-up digger toy to help. Bing finds a lovely poiky thing in the sand and thinks it will make the perfect decoration for the top of his castle - not realising it belongs to Pandos digger.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The voice trumpet leads a game of I Spy where the Teletubbies have to spot different colours - purple, green, yellow and red. What or who can they spot with those colours?

programme.title: Supertato
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of Supertato, the worlds first potato superhero as he tackles the mischievous Evil Pea, in the supermarket aisles.

programme.title: Roots and Fruits
programme.desc: Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, its Grapefruit dedicating the song All My Friends to the close pals who go with her everywhere.

programme.title: Tee and Mo
programme.desc: Tee wants to watch his favourite TV show, `Bubble Duck, but Mo is already watching hers. The battle over the TV remote, to see who gains control of the television, soon gets out of hand.

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Coco is showing Bing how magnets work. While Coco builds a tower, Bing wants to find more magnetic things. In the garden he tests the ball, table and key, announcing which are magnetic. When Bing tries the watering can, he accidentally drops the magnet behind the flowerbed! Neither Bing nor Coco can reach it, so Flop shows them how to fish with magnets.

programme.title: Colourblocks
programme.desc: Fun Pink arrives in Colourland. Learn about the colour pink with the Colourblocks.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: The clubhouse is a mess! Roly wonders what will happen if he doesnt make good choices.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Outside the clubhouse a large crowd has gathered around a hot air balloon with whisperings that someone is going on an adventure.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey is unable to get to sleep, so Mum reads her one last story. Unicorse, the most annoying hand puppet in the world, interrupts them, and Bluey tries to reform it.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Mum, Dad and Bingo must complete both their classes to pass swim school but pleasing strict Big Fish instructor Margaret, aka Bluey, is proving very difficult.

programme.title: Go Jetters
programme.desc: Glitchs hopes of winning a solar-powered race across the Australian outback are foiled when he crashes the Glitchster in the middle of the night. With the solar battery dead, he and Kyan are stranded with no water and no way out. Its up to the Go Jetters to find them and save the day.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.sub-title: The Tale of the Brewing Storm
programme.desc: Peter, Lily and Benjamin race to rescue Cotton-tails beloved blanket, escape Mr Tod and get back home before a brewing storm finally breaks.

programme.title: Octonauts
programme.desc: The Octonauts help a young manta ray find the secret manta ray feeding grounds. However, when they finally locate it, the Octonauts become caught in the middle of a dangerous feeding frenzy.

programme.title: Numberblocks
programme.desc: One needs to fix the space satellite to power up a special show.

programme.title: Wonderblocks
programme.desc: Wonderblock Stop is Gos new best friend. Stop likes to stop and think things through. When Go gets her ball stuck in a tree, Stop encourages her to pause for a moment to find a way to retrieve it.

programme.title: Love Monster
programme.desc: Its Woodworking Day, and Love Monster has a very special project planned. He uses his tools to craft a toy aeroplane from a wooden log.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: A Hey Duggee take on the classic `Head, Shoulders, Knees and Toes sung by Lord Fingal, Hedgley, the Old Deers and Eugene.

programme.title: Playtime Towers
programme.desc: Bella and Lift visit Patch in the Cloud Kitchen. He has found a tiny mouse in his pocket, which reminds him of a tasty treat recipe to make with the Playtimers - pocket mouse pitta!

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Bing and Flop find a patch of fluffy white dandelions in the park. After blowing all the seeds off, but one of them, Bing decides to take the last one as a present to Sula. As they set off across the park Bing negotiates many windy, wobbly hazards to keep the dandelion safe.

programme.title: Yakka Dee
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say dog and go on a whirlwind word adventure. See lots of different dogs and explore how they look and what they do. Witness a tiny dog, a fluffy dog, a very waggy-tailed happy dog and meet a funny sausage dog.

programme.title: Lu and the Bally Bunch
programme.desc: To fulfil Barnabys wish of becoming a baby, Lu and Gus play a family game with him.

programme.title: Piggy Builders
programme.desc: Keith dreams of a pirate adventure. The Piggies build a wheeled ship and sail across Fine Forest for treasure, but Wilf plans to steal it!

programme.title: Twirlywoos
programme.desc: The Twirlywoos open and close the curtains on a stage, while a very important singer is trying to perform! There is more opening and closing when the Box comes to visit the Boat.

programme.title: Something Special: Were All Friends
programme.desc: Theres make-believe fun for Justin and his friend as they pretend to run a pizza restaurant. Meanwhile, Mr Tumble is knitting a fancy new jumper to wear for his pretend fashion show.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies find different uses for their favourite things and a child in Tummy Tales makes a seaside picture out of lots of things from a make-and-do box. In Teletubbyland a large tube appears. The Teletubbies use it as a telescope and as a loud speaker.

programme.title: The Baby Club
programme.desc: Nigel and Baby Bear welcome babies Remi, Otis, George, Holly, DJ, Luke and their grown-ups to The Baby Club. Inside everyones bags are cardboard tubes which are explored through discovery, play, song and story. Grown-ups at home are encouraged to take part by hiding baby appropriate cardboard tubes inside a fabric bag or pillowcase for them to reveal and explore with their baby. The popular song `Twinkle, Twinkle, Little Star features, as does a story involving Baby Bear.

programme.title: Maddie and Triggs
programme.desc: Maddie, an adventurous youngster who happens to be visually impaired, sets out with her best doggy friend Triggs to discover the music and adventure in the sounds of the world around them.

programme.title: Dylans Playtime Adventures
programme.desc: Sports shop owner Dylan wants to sell merchandise, but he must pull out all the stops when a five-armed customer arrives!

programme.title: Kiri and Lou
programme.desc: Lou goes for an unexpected ride while fast asleep on the back of a giant sloth.

programme.title: Vegesaurs
programme.desc: Ginger the Tricarrotops explores the world of the crunchiest era, going on adventures throughout the colourful Vegesaur Valley.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Its bedtime and Bingo cant remember where she left her beloved Flopp. After retracing their steps, Bingo and Bluey lead Mum through their bizarre day in the hope of tracking her down.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Chipmunk is cycling one day delivering his packages when he hits a rock and his trike falls apart! He has so many packages to deliver - what is he going to do now?

programme.title: Hey Duggees Squirrel Club
programme.desc: Today at Squirrel Club, there are all sorts of comparisons to learn, from small to smallest, hungry to hungriest, and Duggee to Duggiest!

programme.title: Roots and Fruits
programme.desc: Live from the Roots and Fruits Theatre, its Strawberry, who used to be insecure, but now cant wait to celebrate herself and sing her song, See the Seeds.

programme.title: Timmy Time
programme.desc: The class build dens for themselves. Otus offers to help Timmy with his, but Timmys pride gets the better of him, as he is sure he can do it on his own. Soon, he realises that two heads may be better than one.

programme.title: Time for School
programme.desc: Its autumn time. Jud, Jessica and their class visit a local park to collect leaves for an art project. Back at school, they use the leaves to create a huge leaf print picture - and things end up getting messy! The school playground is covered in leaves and the school caretaker, Mr Clever, needs help clearing them up. Luckily, he has a team of super leaf sweepers, who come to the rescue.

programme.title: Big Cook Little Cook
programme.desc: Jens brought in her special marble collection to show Small. Larry the lighthouse keeper visits the cafe, Small flies off to see how baked beans are made, and the two friends make starry breakfast sky for their light-shining guest.

programme.title: Go Wild
programme.sub-title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie: Vulture and Brittlestar
programme.desc: Aneeshwar and Lizzie meet a vulture called Ethel. Vultures have amazing eyesight and can spot food from high up in the sky. To meet their next animal, Aneeshwar and Lizzie must go far down below. The brittlestar lives underwater in the ocean.

programme.title: Whats in Your Bag?
programme.desc: Bharatanatyam dancer Suhani tells us all about her ghungroo, or anklet, and why she loves to wear it.

programme.title: Dog Squad
programme.desc: Kika is a golden Labrador and a guide dog for her owner, Dr Amit, who is blind, which means he cannot see. She is trained to use her supersight to help Dr Amit do as many things as he can by himself. Together, they make the best team! Dr Amit and Kika have an important mission to pick up a surprise cake and some party hats from the supermarket for Aunty Ninas birthday.

programme.title: Maddies Do You Know?
programme.desc: Maddie learns what happens to food in our bodies when we eat it and why its important to eat a variety of different foods. We find out which foods give us energy to move around, and which foods we get vitamins and minerals from.

programme.title: Yakka Dee
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say `yo-yo and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see all sorts of yo-yos: some spotty yo-yos, a stripy yo-yo, an up and down yo-yo, a rocking yo-yo and even a peepo yo-yo.

programme.title: Numberblocks
programme.desc: One explores the Double Dungeon of Doom in search of the golden apples, doubling herself all the way up to Octoblock. Learn how to double and halve numbers up to eight with the Numberblocks.

programme.title: Alphablocks
programme.desc: H needs a helping hand to heave herself up the hill, so I turns instructor for an incredible workout. This episode has fun with -it, consonant clusters and the words kit, sit, fit, lift, flip, slip and spin.

programme.title: Wonderblocks
programme.desc: Again comes to Toads aid when it seems he is going to be late meeting some friends.

programme.title: Colourblocks
programme.desc: The Colourblocks enjoy a dance. Find out which colours make the best partners. Learn about similar and complementary colours with the Colourblocks.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Roly has brought his big brothers action hero figure to the Clubhouse. His name is Jet Rocket. He is known for zooming through space, smashing and crashing things and most importantly, saving the world.

programme.title: Yukee
programme.desc: When rapper Bushy T visits the garden, his hip-hop beats may help poor Stripes master Yukees skipping rope and join in the fun.

programme.title: Something Special: Were All Friends
programme.desc: All aboard for a steam train adventure with Justin and his friends! Mr Tumble zooms off into space.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Laa-Laa and Po take turns to ride Pos scooter and then they take turns to play with the Tiddlytubbies. Children in Tummy Tales take turns to press apples into juice.

programme.title: Andys Prehistoric Adventures
programme.desc: Andy goes on another time-travelling adventure to collect barnacles from a prehistoric ocean for his new museum display. During his journey he meets a troop of noisy primates, explores the seabed and tracks down a giant prehistoric whale.

programme.title: Waffle the Wonder Dog
programme.desc: The Essam family visit the Brooklyn-Bells. Jess hopes their well-behaved dog, Baxter, will teach Waffle how to be good, but Waffle has other ideas.

programme.title: Topsy and Tim
programme.desc: Topsy and Tim are very excited - they are going on a camping trip straight after school with Mummy and Dad.

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Topsy is going to read Zebby a naptime story. Raa Raa wants to make the noises to go with the story, but they are all too loud and poor Zebby cant get to sleep. Can Raa Raa find any quiet sleepy noises in the Jingly Jangly Jungle?

programme.title: The Game Catchers
programme.desc: Cosmo-players visit a holiday planet where they learn the Super Tic-Tac-Toe, but the game cant start until theyve collected the materials to play it.

programme.title: Octonauts: Above and Beyond
programme.desc: The Octonauts expand their exploration beyond the sea - and onto land. With new rides and new friends, they are prepared to protect any habitats and animals at risk on land or under the water.

programme.title: Big Lizard
programme.desc: When a meteorite splashes into the sea, Dad and Cosima cause problems by claiming it in the name of science, against the wishes of the sea creatures.

programme.title: Supertato
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of Supertato, the worlds first potato superhero as he tackles the mischievous Evil Pea, in the supermarket aisles.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Duggee is cleaning out the workshop but he needs the squirrelss help. The squirrels work hard but when they finish they cant find Duggee. Oh! They have built a maze out of all the things in Duggees workshop. Duggee is right in the middle of the maze, but can the squirrels find the right way in? And once theyre in, can they find the way out again?

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.sub-title: The Tale of Mr Tods Trap
programme.desc: When Peter, Benjamin and Lily are tempted by a mysterious hoard of radishes, Lily finds herself caught in Mr Tods trap. Can Peter find a way to rescue Lily before Mr Tod reaches her?

programme.title: Time for School
programme.desc: Mrs Farrell and Miss Gerrard are having a Kindness Day at school, a time when the class shows how they can be extra kind to each other. As the children start their day, they are thinking of new ideas to be super-kind. Jessica and Orla draw lovely pictures for the teachers, which makes Mrs Farrell and Miss Gerrard feel happy. At lunchtime Solomon is finding the lid on his yogurt a bit tricky, so Sam helps him to open it!

programme.title: Mojo Swoptops
programme.desc: A shark on the loose in the streets of Swoppiton? Mojo and Bo are on a fishing trip to find out more! But the hungry shark may not be quite as hungry-sharky as they think.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey is unable to get to sleep, so Mum reads her one last story. Unicorse, the most annoying hand puppet in the world, interrupts them, and Bluey tries to reform it.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Mum, Dad and Bingo must complete both their classes to pass swim school but pleasing strict Big Fish instructor Margaret, aka Bluey, is proving very difficult.

programme.title: Piripenguins
programme.desc: When Nuggets favourite teddy bear gets accidentally washed by Pancake, the Piripenguins try to restore its unique smell by painstakingly recreating Nuggets happiest memories.

programme.title: Dodges Pup School
programme.desc: Following Dodge at Pup School, a place full of mishaps and mayhem. Dodge and his pup pals turn school days into adventures with singing, silliness, and occasional squeaky toys.

programme.title: Waffle the Wonder Dog
programme.desc: Its the day after the Brooklyn-Bells wedding and time to say goodbye to the puppy. Evie goes with Jess to her veterinary practice to scan Waffles microchip.

programme.title: Puffin Rock
programme.sub-title: A Night at the Bat Cave
programme.desc: When the friends stay overnight in the Bat Cave, they must keep quiet to avoid waking the hibernating bats.

programme.title: JoJo and Gran Gran
programme.sub-title: Autumn: Its Time to Look for Night-time Animals
programme.desc: JoJo thinks shes seen every animal that visits Cynthias garden. But Cynthia shows JoJo her new night-time camera, which can take photos of nocturnal animals JoJo has never seen. Gran Gran has a plan to help JoJo discover these night-time animals - they can leave a footprint tracker out overnight outside her house to find out which ones visit them. The next day, they check the tracker.

programme.title: Moon and Me
programme.desc: Inside the little Toy House, Moon Baby is playing a hiding game with his friends. In Storyland, everybody plays hiding in different places. But who is hiding where?

programme.title: The Clangers
programme.desc: When Major Clanger decides that the Soup Dragon must be fed-up with dishing up soup for them all every day, he invents a machine to collect the soup instead. But when he takes some soup without even asking the Soup Dragon, he overfills the machine and it gets stuck in the doorway.

programme.title: In the Night Garden
programme.desc: Makka Pakka is washing the ball when his uff-uff is blown away. It falls into Upsy Daisys bed and she carefully retrieves it and sets off through the garden to return it to Makka Pakka.

programme.desc: A different story read by a special guest each night just before bedtime.

programme.title: LEGO DC Super Heroes: The Flash
programme.desc: Reverse-Flash manipulates the Speed Force to put The Flash into a time loop, which forces him to re-live the same day over and over again. The Flash must find a way to restore time and finally apprehend his worst enemy before all is lost.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go! and DC Super Hero Girls: Mayhem in the Multiverse
programme.desc: The Super Hero Girls and the Teen Titans reluctantly band together to fight a new threat to the universe.

programme.title: Barnyard
programme.desc: Otis the cow is a wild-living party animal and just loves to dance until dawn, but then his dad is killed by coyotes, and Otis has to become the responsible leader of the rest of the all-singing, all-dancing farm animals.

programme.title: The Swan Princess: The Secret of the Castle
programme.desc: Princess Odette and Prince Dereks wedding anniversary celebrations are rudely interrupted by evil wizard Clavius, who once again wants to conquer the world. When Clavius kidnaps Queen Uberta, Odette and Derek must put a stop to his fiendish schemes.

programme.title: Extinct
programme.desc: Op and Ed accidentally time-travel from the Galapagos Islands in 1835 to present-day Shanghai. They make their way through the city in confusion and make the horrifying discovery that the species to which they belong became extinct shortly after.

programme.title: Fireheart
programme.desc: In New York City in 1932, women are not allowed to be firefighters. When the citys firemen disappear in mysterious fires, Georgia Nolan sees a golden opportunity. She disguises herself as Joe and joins a team of improvised firemen.

programme.title: Migration
programme.desc: A family of ducks decides to leave the safety of a New England pond for an adventurous trip to Jamaica. However, their well-laid plans quickly go awry when they get lost and wind up in New York City.

programme.title: Dragon Rider
programme.desc: A dragon, an orphaned boy, and a mountain spirit work together as they trek through the Himalayas in search for the Rim of Heaven.

programme.title: Shark Tale
programme.desc: A fast-talking fish gains fame after taking credit for the accidental death of a shark mobster. While enjoying the popularity at first, his tall tale starts to unravel as others begin to suspect that he is not the Defender of the Reef after all, and when the sharks enemies get involved, his lies lead him into dangerous waters. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: The LEGO Movie 2: The Second Part
programme.desc: The citizens of Bricksburg face a dangerous new threat when LEGO DUPLO invaders from outer space start to wreck everything in their path. The battle to defeat the enemy and restore harmony to the LEGO universe takes Emmet, Lucy, Batman and the rest of their friends to faraway, unexplored worlds that test their courage and creativity.

programme.title: Wallace and Gromit in The Curse of the Were-Rabbit
programme.desc: The village is being overrun by rabbits and Wallace has a plan to alter their minds so that they will leave the vegetable allotments alone. However, his plan goes awry and the rabbit problem escalates when the villagers discover a monstrous `were-rabbit destroying everything in its sights. Will Wallace and Gromit be able to solve the conundrum before the creature gets shot?

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania
programme.desc: Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the counts teen-aged daughter.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: Concerned that his half-human grandson isnt showing his vampire side, Dracula and his friends put the boy through a `monster-in-training boot camp just as Dracs old-school father decides to pay a visit.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 3: A Monster Vacation
programme.desc: Mavis surprises Dracula with plans for a fun-filled summer voyage on a monster cruise. As the pack starts enjoying colossal buffets and exotic excursions, Drac finds himself falling for the ships intriguing but dangerous captain. He soon learns that trying to balance family, friends and romance might just be too much to handle. even for the worlds most powerful vampire.

programme.title: Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron
programme.desc: The story of a wild mustang stallion captured by horse traders and sold to a cavalry regiment at a frontier outpost, where a cruel colonel attempts to break the free-spirited horse. However, he escapes in the company of a Native American youth and embarks upon a series of adventures in the harsh and unforgiving times of the Old West.

programme.title: Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas
programme.desc: The brave mariner Sinbad battles raging elements, mutinous dogs and fearsome monsters to retrieve the Book of Peace after being framed by the treacherous Goddess of Chaos. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.desc: The story of a wild mustang stallion captured by horse traders and sold to a cavalry regiment at a frontier outpost, where a cruel colonel attempts to break the free-spirited horse. However, he escapes in the company of a Native American youth and embarks upon a series of adventures in the harsh and unforgiving times of the Old West.

programme.title: Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas
programme.desc: The brave mariner Sinbad battles raging elements, mutinous dogs and fearsome monsters to retrieve the Book of Peace after being framed by the treacherous Goddess of Chaos. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber To
programme.desc: Twenty years after their last adventure, good-hearted, yet dimwitted best friends, Harry Dunne and Lloyd Christmas head out in search for Harrys long lost daughter, and Lloyds in love again.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: Happy Gilmore is a bad boy ice hockey player who fails to make the grade because he cant skate or control his temper, but he does have a powerful shot and realises he can hit a golf ball 400 yards. When his grans house is repossessed because she never paid tax, he agrees to take up golf to try and win enough money to buy it back, but he cant putt and the golfing establishment arent happy to have him around.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: You, Me and Dupree
programme.desc: Carl is in seventh heaven when he marries his gorgeous girlfriend Molly in Hawaii. After a blissful honeymoon, they get back to find best man Dupree jobless, penniless and homeless. When Carl offers him a place to crash, he has no idea of the havoc that the blonde bum is about to cause.

programme.title: Housesitter
programme.desc: Newton Davis builds a dream home for his childhood sweetheart and is promptly dumped. Devastated, he seeks solace in the arms of a waitress, but sneaks off into the night once hes had his fun. The spurned waitress exacts her revenge by moving into the empty house and masquerading as Newtons wife. At this stage, things start getting complicated.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop
programme.desc: A fast-talking cop trails his best friends killer from the alleys of Detroit to the posh galleries of Beverly Hills.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls
programme.desc: Sequel about the zany private detective who specialises in locating missing pets. Ace Ventura travels to Africa to search for a kidnapped sacred albino bat, which reputedly has the power to restore peace between two warring tribes.

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: Set on a Greek island, a young woman who is about to be married suspects that any one of three men could be her father. She invites them all to her wedding without telling her mother. Movie adaptation of the musical, set to Abbas greatest hits.

programme.title: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
programme.desc: In 1979 Donna falls in love with Sam while embarking on a series of adventures throughout Europe. In the present day, Donnas pregnant daughter reunites with her mothers old friends and boyfriends on the Greek island of Kalokairi.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Rachel Chu is happy to accompany her longtime boyfriend, Nick, to his best friends wedding in Singapore. Shes also surprised to learn that Nicks family is extremely wealthy and hes considered one of the countrys most eligible bachelors. Thrust into the spotlight, Rachel must now contend with jealous socialites, quirky relatives and something far, far worse: Nicks disapproving mother.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: The continuing adventures of the Portokalos family. A follow-up to the 2002 comedy, My Big Fat Greek Wedding.

programme.title: Dads Army
programme.desc: In 1940, with a German invasion looming, the defence of Walmington-on-Sea is in the hands of local bank manager Captain Mainwaring and a motley collection of volunteers. After a series of blunders, the Home Guard finally get the glory they deserve.

programme.title: Dads Army
programme.desc: In 1940, with a German invasion looming, the defence of Walmington-on-Sea is in the hands of local bank manager Captain Mainwaring and a motley collection of volunteers. After a series of blunders, the Home Guard finally get the glory they deserve.

programme.title: Chicago
programme.desc: Roxy Hart is sent to prison for shooting her lying lover. In prison she meets tabloid darling and headline singer, Velma Kelly, who is also in for a double murder. With the help of a slick Chicago lawyer, she learns to play the media game and vies for the valuable press attention that will get her out of jail.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: Following the adventures of The Dreamettes, an all-girl singing group. Theyre going nowhere fast until they meet fast-talking car salesman-come-manager who has ambitions to make a fortune selling black music to a white audience. He persuades them to become backing singers for James `Thunder Early, but the larger-than-life lead singer Effie White must step out of the spotlight in favour of the more image-friendly Deena Jones.

programme.title: Horizon: An American Saga: Chapter 1
programme.desc: In 1859 families discover the lure of the Old West as they settle in territories from Wyoming to Kansas. Meanwhile, a gruff cowboy soon finds himself on the run with a prostitute and a young boy after killing a fellow gunman.

programme.title: Calvary
programme.desc: An honest and good-hearted priest wrestles with a cynical and spiteful community after he receives a death threat from an unknown parishioner.

programme.title: Young at Heart
programme.desc: Laurie Tuttle and Barney Sloan fall in love despite the presence of her fiance, Alex Burke. Sloan is a musician called in to score a comedy Burke is writing who steals Tuttles heart, but since she has two equally attractive sisters, a happy ending is guaranteed.

programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: The story of British humanitarian Nicholas Winton, who helped save hundreds of predominantly Jewish children from the Nazis on the eve of World War II.

programme.title: The Bridges at Toko-Ri
programme.desc: A conflicted Navy pilot and veteran of the Second World War questions the role he is forced to play when he is called back into service for the Korean War.

programme.title: The Girl on the Train
programme.desc: A divorced train commuter passes the house she used to live in with her husband every day. To distract herself she creates a fictional perfect world for her former neighbours in her head. This is ruined when one of the neighbours goes missing.

programme.title: The Kings Speech
programme.desc: Afflicted with a stammer, Prince Albert, the Duke of York, dreads the speaking engagements that come with being the son of King George V.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
programme.desc: Elizabeth might have her royal rival Mary Queen of Scots in custody, but a far greater threat lies to the east: the Spanish Armada. Despite her reign of 30 years, Elizabeths hold on the English throne remains uncertain. Her kingdom lies in the shadow of mighty Spain, Philip IIs vast army and the Inquisition, but Elizabeth is undaunted.

programme.title: Champion
programme.desc: Midge Kelly steps into the ring to defend his world title and then tells his rise to fame through flashback. A drifter with his brother Connie, his only way out of the poverty of the Depression is to climb into the ring, under the guidance of trainer Tommy Haley. As he rises to the top, he tramples on everyone whos helped him, from Haley to his first wife Emma.

programme.title: Ride On
programme.desc: Washed-up stuntman Luo seeks help from his estranged daughter and her lawyer boyfriend when his beloved stunt horse may be auctioned off to pay his debts. Luo and Red Hare become a media sensation when their fight with debt collectors goes viral.

programme.title: Journey to the Center of the Earth
programme.desc: Volcanologist Trevor Anderson journeys into the Earths core after discovering evidence that the famous authors story was based on fact. Accompanied by his teenage nephew Sean and fellow scientist Hannah, Trevor is soon coming face-to-face with an astonishing and extremely perilous hidden world.

programme.title: Journey 2: The Mysterious Island
programme.desc: A teen and his new stepfather find an island of secrets, strange life forms and gold after they answer a coded distress signal.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: A magic portal transports the little blue people to Manhattan, where they must find a way back to their village before evil wizard Gargamel can find them.

programme.title: Save The Cinema
programme.desc: Sky Original film following Welsh hairdresser Liz Evans fight to save her small towns theatre. Poignant British drama based on a true story starring Samantha Morton.

programme.title: Ride On
programme.desc: Washed-up stuntman Luo seeks help from his estranged daughter and her lawyer boyfriend when his beloved stunt horse may be auctioned off to pay his debts. Luo and Red Hare become a media sensation when their fight with debt collectors goes viral.

programme.title: Twist
programme.desc: A thrilling modern day take on Charles Dickens novel, `Oliver Twist, as a gang of street hustlers plan the heist of the century.

programme.title: The Smurfs 2
programme.desc: Papa and the rest of the Smurfs reunite with their human friends to rescue Smurfette from the clutches of evil wizard Gargamel.

programme.title: The BFG
programme.desc: A 10-year-old girl, Queen Victoria and the Big Friendly Giant must devise a plan to get rid of Bloodbottler, Fleshlumpeater and all the other bad giants once and for all.

programme.title: The Scorpion King
programme.desc: In a time before the pyramids, an evil king threatens to take over the world, so the leaders of the remaining tribes under threat call upon a desert warrior to help them defeat the wicked one and his brutal hordes. As the warrior battles against the evil around him, he is preparing for a final showdown that will decide if it is to be his destiny to become the great Scorpion King.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit 2
programme.desc: Despite his efforts, Peter cant seem to shake his reputation for mischief among the other rabbits. Once he adventures out of the garden Peter finds himself in a world where mischief is appreciated, but soon his family come to bring him home.

programme.title: Oliver!
programme.desc: Endearing film version of Lionel Barts successful stage musical based on Dickenss tale of the fluctuating fortunes of an orphan boy. Ron Moody stands out as the wily old scrounger Fagin in a series of well-crafted set-pieces and atmospheric musical numbers, and a tribe of child stars brings the 19th-century London underworld vividly to life.

programme.title: Goosebumps
programme.desc: A young kid teams up with the niece of young adult horror author R.L. Stine after the writers imaginary demons are set free on the town of Greendale, Maryland.

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Two twin brothers, Jared and Simon, and their sister Mallory are relocated by their mother to their great-great uncles creepy home in the middle of nowhere. Exploring, Jared finds his great-great uncles secret study and a book, the `Field Guide to the Fantastical World around Them, which opens up a world of goblins, spirits, ogres, trolls and griffins, some of whom are friendly and helpful and others not.

programme.title: Saturday Night Fever
programme.desc: A Brooklyn disco dancer develops doubts about his lifestyle when he teams up with an ambitious woman for a big contest.

programme.title: Ferris Buellers Day Off
programme.desc: A teen perpetrates a series of elaborate deceptions to ensure that he and two friends spend a carefree day in Chicago.

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: A group set out on safari into the heart of the Congo. Each have their different reasons for the trip, but nothing could have prepared them for the greatest danger - a troop of intelligent killer apes.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: John Wayne won an Oscar here as Rooster Cogburn, a lawman recruited by a teenager seeking revenge on her fathers murderer.

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
programme.desc: British POWs are ordered by their Japanese captors to construct a bridge of strategic importance and are happy to sabotage and delay the progress until their commanding officers orders them to continue the work unhindered to its completion, but are his actions tantamount to collaborating with the enemy?

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: Investigating the assassination of a friend of the President, CIA agent Ryan discovers that his friend was in league with the Colombian drugs cartels. In revenge, a paramilitary force is sent in to wipe out the drug lords but when the operation goes wrong, theyre abandoned by their country. Now their only hope is Ryan and fellow renegade operative Clark.

programme.title: Shane
programme.desc: A former gunslinger must strap on his six-shooter once again to defend homesteaders from a greedy cattle baron.

programme.title: The Day of the Jackal
programme.desc: An international hit man and quick-change artist is hired by a secret organisation to assassinate Charles de Gaulle.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: John Wayne won an Oscar here as Rooster Cogburn, a lawman recruited by a teenager seeking revenge on her fathers murderer.

programme.title: High Plains Drifter
programme.desc: A mysterious stranger rides into a small frontier town in the American southwest, provoked into a gunfight in which he kills three men, and then begged by the townsfolk to become sheriff. The residents are terrified of the gunslinger but live in greater fear of a gang which intends to wipe out the whole town.

programme.title: Midnight Express
programme.desc: Based on the true story of an American who endured the horrors of a Turkish prison after his arrest on drug charges.

programme.title: Taxi Driver
programme.desc: New York City cab driver Travis Bickle constantly reflects on the ugly corruption of life around him, and becomes increasingly disturbed over his own loneliness and alienation. In nearly every phase of his life, Bickle remains a complete outsider, failing to make emotional contact with anyone. Unable to sleep night after night, Travis haunts the local pornography emporiums to find diversion.

programme.title: Manodrome
programme.desc: Tormented by personal demons, Ralphie encounters a mysterious organization of men who welcome him as one of their own. As he struggles to define himself, pressure mounts and a powder keg is lit as he blows a hole in the lives of everyone he touches.

programme.title: The Fighting Temptations
programme.desc: A New York executive down on his luck finds out hes been left $150,000 by his aunt Sally. Returning to his hometown in Georgia, he discovers theres a catch - he has to create a gospel choir capable of winning the Gospel Explosion competition. Recruiting the towns one decent singer, he assembles a mish-mash of singers, including local convicts, and sets about getting them into shape.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In the late 21st century, a factory worker visits a company that implants fake memories. However, after his procedure he struggles to tell real and fabricated thoughts apart.

programme.title: Ghost Rider
programme.desc: Comic-book adventure about a stunt motorcyclist tricked into making a pact with Mephistopheles. The rider can only escape doing the demons bidding if he agrees to battle the dark lords son. To this end, he assumes the identity of the supernatural Ghost Rider, a terrifying night-time vigilante with a flaming skull.

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: Columbus and Tallahassee have orchestrated a way to survive a world overrun by zombies. With only fear keeping the `big wuss Columbus alive, Tallahassee wants to eradicate the `last Twinkie on Earth. The duo join forces with Wichita and Little Rock who have a style and tact of their own when it comes to dealing with the flesh-eating chaos.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: The continuing adventures of the Portokalos family. A follow-up to the 2002 comedy, My Big Fat Greek Wedding.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: When a criminal plot endangers the beach, Mitch Buchannon leads his elite squad of lifeguards on a mission to prove that one doesnt need to wear a badge to save the bay.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Rachel Chu is happy to accompany her longtime boyfriend, Nick, to his best friends wedding in Singapore. Shes also surprised to learn that Nicks family is extremely wealthy and hes considered one of the countrys most eligible bachelors. Thrust into the spotlight, Rachel must now contend with jealous socialites, quirky relatives and something far, far worse: Nicks disapproving mother.

programme.title: Bob Marley: One Love
programme.desc: Jamaican singer-songwriter Bob Marley overcomes adversity to become the most famous reggae musician in the world.

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: High-spirited musical set in 1950s America, in which a girl and boy who met on the beach are unexpectedly reunited at high school. She cannot understand how different he has become. Can the leather-clad, tough-talking leader of the T-Birds really be the same person? Perhaps her new friends, the Pink Ladies, can help her win back his heart?

programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: A down-on-her-luck actress accepts an offer to star in a film shot on a mysterious island. While there, the actress is abducted by natives who offer her as a sacrifice to a giant ape, which instead of harming the starlet becomes smitten with her. The crew manage to capture the ape and bring it back to Manhattan to exhibit as a showpiece. However, on the shows opening night, things go horribly wrong.

programme.title: Friday the 13th, Part II

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Friday the 13th - Part III
programme.desc: Jason is still on the loose. While the hunt for him continues, another group of teenagers arrive at Lake Crystal. Among them is Chris, who is troubled by visions from the past where she was attacked in the woods by a deformed monster, only to awake safe in her bed. Determined to face her demons, she and her boyfriend Rick are among the group partying at the Lake but Jason is ready to exact revenge.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Lawnmower Man
programme.desc: Visually arresting thriller about a researcher who uses a mentally disabled gardener for ill-advised experiments in inducing mental development through virtual reality simulations. At first, the simulations seem to enhance the lawnmower mans mental powers, but then the experiment goes haywire. Based on a short story by Stephen King.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Escape From the 21st Century
programme.desc: Three friends discover they have the power to travel back and forth twenty years with a sneeze. The future is not as good as they hoped, and they need to take on the responsibility of saving the world.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Jules
programme.desc: A mans quiet life gets upended when a UFO crashes in his backyard in rural Pennsylvania. As he befriends the mysterious extraterrestrial, things start to get complicated when two neighbours discover it and the government quickly closes in.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Voyagers
programme.desc: Set in the near future, the film chronicles the odyssey of 30 young men and women who are sent deep into space on a multi-generational mission in search of a new home. The mission descends into madness, as the crew reverts to its most primal state, not knowing if the real threat they face is whats outside the ship or who theyre becoming inside it.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: A fleet of ships is forced to do battle with an armada of unknown origins in order to discover and thwart their destructive goals.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Blade Runner
programme.desc: An ex-cop sets out on the trail of androids who have mutinied in a bid to extend their limited lifespan and fled back to Earth.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Ready Player One
programme.desc: In 2045 the planet is on the brink of chaos and collapse, but people find salvation in the OASIS: an expansive virtual reality universe created by eccentric James Halliday. When Halliday dies, he promises his immense fortune to the first person to discover a digital Easter egg thats hidden somewhere in the OASIS. When young Wade Watts joins the contest, he finds himself becoming an unlikely hero in a reality-bending treasure hunt through a fantastical world of mystery, discovery and danger.

programme.desc: A federal agent and an Interpol detective play a cat-and-mouse game with cunning illusionists who rob corrupt business leaders during their performances, then funnel the money to members of the audience.

programme.desc: A man diagnosed with 23 separate personalities kidnaps and imprisons three teenage girls, who must try to escape before his terrifying 24th personality finally comes to light.

programme.desc: A mild mannered, socially weird government accountant moonlights as a highly trained, and deadly assassin.

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: The curator of the Louvre museum is murdered, leaving behind a chain of obscure clues to a world-changing secret. Cryptologist Sophie Neveu and Harvard professor Robert Langdon embark on a race against time to uncover the precious truth before it falls into the wrong hands.

programme.title: Vantage Point
programme.desc: While on a Global War on Terror summit in Spain, the president of the United States falls victim to an attempted assassination. Seen from different perspectives, the event is told and re-told by the presidents bodyguards and members of the audience.

programme.desc: A troubled female cop must unravel the perfect murder as she matches wits with two homicidal schoolboys, who believe they cant be caught after committing a motiveless crime. As she gets ever closer to the truth she at once alienates her new partner and puts her own life in peril.

programme.desc: Set in Depression-era Franklin County, Virginia, a bootlegging gang is threatened by a new deputy and other authorities who want a cut of their profits.

programme.desc: It is horror! It is murder! Brutal death as well as exciting fights with an exceptional last-minute rescue. programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Chimp Bryan has a trip to the dentist to remove a rotten molar, and Lee Butler returns to Vietnam to assess repairs needed at Monkey Worlds sister sanctuary.

programme.title: Africas Underwater Wonders
programme.desc: In one of Africas greatest lakes, rock and water set the stage for evolutions most magnificent display. This episode tells the story of this remarkable example of evolution in action, as well as showing how the lake provides for a range of life, both above and below the surface.

programme.title: My Best Friends An Animal
programme.desc: Flap around with Banksi the fruit bat, celebrate a pigs rescue-versary, and learn how to speak baboon with Dingani, who has developed a one-of-a-kind kinship with his primate pal Lucy.

programme.title: Wild Wild East
programme.desc: Cape Breton Highlands National Park was established to protect the primeval forest from clear-cutting, but today the park faces a new threat. Moose, Beavers and Moths have combined to decimate large sections of the Boreal and Acadian woodlands.

programme.title: Wild Wild East
programme.desc: Wild Wild Easts wetland habitats are at risk. These marshes and bogs are the ancient home of the endangered Blandings Turtle, but each fall new turtles spring from the lake shores of Nova Scotia.

programme.title: Wild Sky
programme.desc: Examining the Amazon rainforests oxygen-breathing trees and meeting flamingos that thrive in the suns scorching UV rays.

programme.desc: Join baby capuchin monkey Chico in Brazil as he explores a forest full of excitement and danger and learns key skills that will allow him to survive and thrive.

programme.sub-title: Jail Bailout Blues; Rare Disease? Financial Disaster!
programme.desc: A man cannot repay his loan on time after he falls on hard times due to his wifes illness. Plus, a family friend rescues a young man and lets him move in with them and then sues him when he doesnt pay her back.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Which Driver Is Lying?!; Hauling Business Fail!
programme.desc: When motorists offer up wildly different collision stories, the timing of their damage claims makes all the difference. A man claims he grossed $200,000 but was still unable to pay for the truck and trailer he bought from a former friend.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: In a small South Carolina town in 1991, 17-year-old Crystal Faye Todd, a popular high school student, was raped, murdered and dumped in a deserted field. With few leads, authorities DNA tested several friends and the match was a shock to all.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A woman vanished from her home on Prince Edward Island. Her abandoned car was found in a field; inside, the windows were spattered with blood. During the search for her body, police found a plastic bag containing a sneakers and a leather jacket.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: In 1984, hundreds of people in Oregon became ill with food poisoning. Detectives tracked down the outbreak to a cult which aimed to use germ warfare to take down the government.

programme.title: Murder UK

programme.title: 48 Hours

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A young prostitute is found dead in an Ohio waterway. Authorities face huge challenges to find the killer, with DNA evidence washed away and her policeman clients.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: A father dreams his daughter has been killed, then she disappears - what does her boyfriend know, and could the dads nightmare have been an omen.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When a woman is found dead from a gun-shot wound, police suspect her husband. However, forensic teams prove what really happened and the truth is stranger than fiction.

programme.title: Medical Detectives

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: Two people witnessed a truck driving over an unconscious man. They fled into a nearby bar, but when the police turned up, the truck and the man were gone.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When a womans badly decomposed body is found in a box, police call on forensic entomologists to find out how and when she was killed. The presence of insects may hold some vital answers.

programme.sub-title: Horse Tragedy in Unsafe Stables?!; Barter Fail!
programme.desc: A woman says her horse was injured and held hostage by a stable owner; a couple regret trying to barter cash and a vehicle for a kitchen overhaul.

programme.sub-title: Parents on the Run From Each Other!?
programme.desc: A man accuses his childs mother of sabotaging his visitation and sues her for travel expenses.

programme.desc: A woman accused of failing to repay a loan after finding out her boyfriend is a felon; a roommate sues a circus acrobat for return of his rent and security deposit.

programme.sub-title: Lame Horse Trespassing?!; Im Tired of Paying for Weed!
programme.desc: A woman secretly returns a horse she says has chronic arthritis; a marijuana grower says his landlord smoked with him.

programme.sub-title: New Boat Owner Fail!; Sister Fighting DUI

programme.sub-title: Malicious Call to Child Protective Services?!; Horrible Tenant?!; Intersection Collision!
